q1: Croatia recently lost to France in the Men's World Cup final.
a1: Croatia did lose but they played really well to be able to make it to the final.
q2: Croatia are full of good players
q3: Do you think Croatia will have a hard time replacing a player like Luka Modric?
a3: Yes the fans would not be happy about it

a4: croatia showed their full potential reaching the final with several matches with extra time

a5: Yes, Modric was key to them putting up such stiff competition as an underdog.
